title: Harry Vermaas
text: Cornelis Hermanus "Harry" Vermaas (born 23 January 1984) is a South African <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> footballer who currently plays for <a href="USA%20Limoges">USA Limoges</a> in the French domestic <a href="F%C3%A9d%C3%A9rale%201">Fédérale 1</a> competition. He is a versatile front rower who is capable of playing either at <a href="Prop%20%28rugby%20union%29">prop</a> or at <a href="Hooker%20%28rugby%20union%29">hooker</a> and has also represented <a href="Leinster%20Rugby">Leinster</a>, the <a href="Blue%20Bulls">Blue Bulls</a>, <a href="Boland%20Cavaliers">Boland Cavaliers</a>, <a href="Pumas%20%28Currie%20Cup%29%29">Pumas</a> and the <a href="South%20Africa%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">Springboks'</a> Under-21 team.
